content:
The Spider-Verse figure is a great choice! The unique design and colors really make it stand out. 

Your idea of displaying the No Way Home figures in a group with a diorama or backdrop is fantastic! Recreating a scene from the movie will add an extra layer of excitement and storytelling to your display. You could even consider adding some LED lights or special effects to create a more dynamic display.

Now, about your vinyl record collection... Congratulations on scoring that limited edition pressing of The Beatles' Abbey Road at a garage sale! That's an amazing find, and it's great that you're passionate about collecting vinyl records.

7 new albums in a month is impressive! What drew you to vinyl collecting, and do you have a favorite artist or genre that you focus on? Are you displaying your records in a special way, or do you have a dedicated setup for them?

By the way, have you considered combining your love of vinyl records and Funko POP!s? There are some amazing vinyl record-themed Funko POP!s out there, and it could be a fun way to tie your two collections together!
